price: 57. Ya soló, baye na ntina ya bobangi Nkolo wa bango, batondisami na mawa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
